en.wellShortDescription: Software Engineer - Currently working at Macrovesta
en.wellLongDescription: I turn complex problems into intuitive interfaces. I've worked with distributed teams across the UK, Spain, and Italy, providing technical solutions, aligning business needs with code, and making sure everything reaches production without any drama.

skills.content: Macrovesta, recognized among the Top 30 Global Innovators. I developed the frontend architecture of the product that received international recognition for its impact on pricing strategy and risk management in the agri-food chain.

skills.title: Best Programming Award in Murcia - Technovation Challenge
skills.content: Mentored the O2Save team during the Technovation Challenge 2019, guiding participants in developing a mobile application focused on environmental protection. Their application won the Best Programming Award in the Murcia region.

skills.title: Cori Hackathon 2020 Mentor
skills.content: Mentored invited participants at the Cori Hackathon 2020, where they presented an augmented reality application to raise awareness about the importance of oceans.
